Downtown Cocoa Beach, Florida
(Minutemen Causeway/Brevard Ave)
Event Dates
Thanksgiving Weekend 2025
Saturday November 29 – Sunday November 30.
Art Show Hours
Saturday 9 am – 5 pm
Sunday 9 am – 4 pm
For more information contact
Art Director
